lead_paragraph: The announcement came days after a killing at a shelter in Harlem, where a man with a history of psychiatric issues is suspected of fatally stabbing a former teacher.

headline.print_headline: De Blasio Plans to Improve Security and Mental Health Help at Shelters
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Announces Plans to Boost Security and Mental Health Staff at New York City Shelters

snippet: The announcement came days after a killing at a shelter in Harlem, where a man with a history of psychiatric issues is suspected of fatally stabbing a former teacher.
abstract: Officials for de Blasio administration unveil plans to shore up security at 27 homeless shelters, and hire additional medical staff to help identify mental illness among residents of such facilities; announcement follows string of attacks at city shelters and criticism of existing safety standards.
